hi Jamie,

to run Heritrix1 in Eclipse:

- create a new project from SVN
   File > New > Other > Checkout projects from SVN
   Create a new repository location:
   https://archive-crawler.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/archive-crawler
   Select trunk/heritrix
   Click Finish

- create a new Run Configuration
   Project: heritrix
   Main class: org.archive.crawler.Heritrix
   Program arguments: -a admin:admin
   VM Arguments: -Dheritrix.development  -Xmx512M
   Click Run

- open browser to web UI at: http://localhost:8080

Note: the VM argument "-Dheritrix.development" sets the
heritrix.development property, which helps the Heritrix
class find the admin UI webapp in a development
environment. see source for details.

if you are missing any jars, be sure to setup an M2_REPO
variable in Eclipse which points to your maven repository,
typically "~/.m2/repository", and run mvn install (outside
of Eclipse) inside your project directory, to have the
necessary jars pulled in.


/steve@...
